channel.title: My first app - Series - MAUI, c'est clair !
channel.description: My first app - Series - MAUI, c'est clair !

item.title: How to navigate
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: We are now starting to create the main page of the application. But new page also means, enable the user going to that page! So let's see how to implement the navigation from one page to another.

item.title: MVVM is the key to succeed
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: In this chapter, we will discover a major design pattern for mobile application development, the Model-View-ViewModel (MVVM)!

item.title: First run of the project

item.title: Introduction
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: Hi Dev-s! ðŸ¤“ I'm J-E and my goal with this blog is to help any beginner developer willing to get started with his mobile application through very simple lessons. No long theoretical courses, here you will quickly have fun and produce cool apps! And I'll guide you from the development stage until your application is available on the stores.
